entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:43 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:43 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
